PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-14722013-12-17,  ,  ,  ,  TC
ActTransportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada Act
PrecisAppointment of JOHN BADOWSKI of Hamilton, Ontario, to be a full-time member of the Transportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years; and designation of JOHN BADOWSKI as Vice-Chairperson of the Transportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada; effective January 1, 2014.
AttachmentsAttachment
